snippet.title: [Eiyuu Senki GOLD] - Observer of Another World!  Hiranyapura Area (Battle 3 of 3, Nightmare Mode)
snippet.description:
Third and last battle at Hiranyapura of the Mu Continent and the boss is no other than Mu herself. Her Transformed form's Brionac skill  will guaranteely kill you and even if you managed to survive, you'll get pushed back and probably won't reach her and get sealed if you stepped on a seal tile

Took me a good number of tries to beat this one. I used the delaying strategy to prevent them to attack which is very useful in this run. I also managed to do my highest damage so far for Goemon which is really a boss killer. Chihaya's Hero Summon really helped a lot and probably wouldn't be able to beat her without him. I Never imagined i would beat this one though i was still not that strategically smart when i first fought her so i guess it's not really impossible
